body.name: Dynarex DynaCare Twin Blade Razors, Disposable Unisex Razor with Two Blades Provides Smooth, Close Shave, for Prior to Procedures or Tattoos, Blue, 6 Boxes - 50 Razors per Box

features: EXCEPTIONAL HAIR REMOVAL: Ensure a clean, close shave without irritation by using DynaCare twin blade razors. The precisely sharpened dual blades provide exceptional hair removal on both the face and body of men or women.

SAFELY PREP SKIN: Medical professionals safely prepare the skin prior to surgical procedures using twin blade razors making DynaCare Twin Blade Razors the ideal choice for removing hair from the skin before a tattoo.

DISPOSABLE: Choose a fresh razor on every client for sanitary best practices. Also try this twin blade disposable razor for personal use - they are long-lasting and come with a clear plastic guard for safety and protection.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN: The angled head and comfortable to hold plastic handle delivers ergonomic function when shaving. The twin blade razor’s handle has a textured design to provide a secure grip when used wet or dry.

SUPERIOR QUALITY: All components of the DynaCare Twin Blade Razor are made using superior quality materials, allowing you to perform a smooth and close shave. Dynarex provides Best in Class alternative to other leading brands.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dynarex DynaCare Twin Blade Razors, Disposable Unisex Razor, Ideal for use Prior to Procedures or Tattoos, Blue, 1 Case - 6 Boxes of 50 Razors Need to Stock Up on New Razors? Many people think that razors are only used for personal grooming. However, they are also essential supplies in patient-care facilities and operating rooms. This is because hair removal is a necessary part of preparing a patient for surgery. But whether it's for personal or medical use, it's vital to use the right razor every time — one that's sharp enough to provide you with a clean, smooth shave. It's also important to choose a razor with a good grip since this can affect control and safety during use. The Twin Blade Razor from Dynarex is an economical alternative to conventional razors.

A Smoother, Closer Shave Our disposable razor features a fixed-head design and is fitted with twin blades. The sharp dual blades allow for a closer cut and won't tug at hairs. They also reduce the need for double-passing, hence minimizing damage caused by the blade scraping against the skin. Made for quick and efficient shaving, this razor can be used on various parts of the body including the face, stomach, armpits, and legs.

Designed for Better Control A slippery razor isn't just challenging to use; it can be quite dangerous, too. This is why we designed our razor's plastic handle with deep, straight, grooves. These provide a secure, non-slip grip that allows for easier handling while shaving flat or contoured parts of the body. This, in turn, helps you shave faster and more efficiently, as well as avoid painful nicks and cuts.

Functional for Up to Several Uses The twin blades on our razor retain their sharp edges for longer. This lets you use the razor a few times before needing to dispose of it, making it an economical option. Our disposable razor also comes with a clear plastic guard. After every use, cover the razor head with the cap to protect the blades and extend their service life.

More Reasons to Choose the Dynarex Twin Blade Razors! For Personal & Professional Use This disposable razor can be used in a wide variety of settings. It can be a great addition to personal grooming kits at home or in elderly care facilities. It can also be used by both men and women. The razor is recommended for single-use for patients in clinical and hospital settings. The same is recommended for establishments that offer tattooing services and skincare treatments. Cost-Efficient, Generous Bundle With this bulk package of disposable razors, you'll have enough shavers to last you for a reasonable amount of time. Our razors are sold in cases, with each case containing 6 boxes. Inside each box are 5 bags, and each bag is packed with 10 razors. All in all, you'll be receiving a total of 300 disposable razors. The razor heads are covered with clear plastic caps to protect the blades during storage and transport. Caring For Clients Like Family At Dynarex, we care for our customers like family. This is why we only provide them with premium products that are manufactured according to strict quality and safety standards. We are committed to offering top-of-the-line and innovative products for the wellness and medical industry — products that can help physicians and medical professionals deliver quality patient care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2016
reviews.reviewText: My husband thought I was crazy buying 200 razors at once! I purchased these razors in August 2014 looking for an economical solution to shaving, and I am very impressed that two years later I still have a few individual packs lefts! This order was enough to allow three people to shave with a new blade whenever they felt it needed replace unlike with more expensive blades we had tried to "make last" due to cost. Yes, they are not fancy, no pretty colors or curved handles but the blades are sharp and do their job. This two year supply (for 3 people!) cost less than one blade replacement pack would cost...unbelievable savings!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2014
reviews.reviewText: These were shipped from a vet supply store. If they're good enough to shave animal hair they can handle my puny whiskers. These actually seem sharper than the yellow handled BICS I usually buy. Since they're so cheap I only use them 1 or 2 times and then toss them. I didn't comprehend exactly how many razors I was ordering and was a little surprised by the size of the box. I only shave like once or twice a week so I'm set for at least a few years!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product for the budget!
reviews.reviewText: The razor is pretty good for the budget I recommend use one for each shave. Dont use same one everytime. Is razor is better than Gillette 3 sensor simple because it will you cuts and razor bumps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dulls quickly - not for legs!
reviews.reviewText: I give these a 1 star rating because my husband said they are ok for shaving his face. I would personally give them a "-1 star" if possible because I could not shave one full leg before it dulled out. If you have a small area to shave for a single use I think they may be ok. I would not purchase these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Razors for a Great Bargain price!!!
reviews.reviewText: Found this really good deal when i was looking for something to shave my head with.It does the job really well. Although the razors last only a shave or two at the most.But at this price (less than $20 for 300 razors), whos counting. Delivery was quick and efficient, would definitely buy again when I run out (wont be for a while though ;-) )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap just like I wanted
reviews.reviewText: At 0.30 cents per razor (when I bought them) this was the cheapest option available. I only use these disposable razors once and then throw them away as the blades are always torn up by the end of the shave. I usually only shave with the razor once or twice a week at most and use an electric when I'm lazy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2013
reviews.reviewText: Well package and as described. One caution though, the blades were very sharp and I cut myself a lot the first time I used them. Now it is fine and I realize that I do not have to put as much pressure on these blades as I have had to do with others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'd recommend these
reviews.reviewText: They work great. They are just if not better than any 10 pack disposable I've purchased from any store. Has provided a clean close shave without those unexplained nicks or cuts. I ordered five cases and after the use of fifty razors I ordered five more cases. They are used in a health care facility is why we use so many.
